div.h1:
Coronado Elementary School
Our Mission... Learn from yesterday, explore today, leave a legacy for tomorrow.

h1.span: Welcome to your Free Lightbox K–5 Subscription

p.span: We're glad that we can help you and your school with Digital and Distance Learning during this time by offering you unlimited access to our 788 Interactive eBooks for Grades K–5 at no cost until August 1, 2020.

table.style: font-variant-numeric: inherit; font-variant-east-asian: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-size: 15px; line-height: inherit; font-family: "Segoe UI", "Segoe UI Web (West European)", "Segoe UI", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; border-collapse: collapse; color: rgb(32, 31, 30); text-align: start; background-color: rgb(76, 170, 216); min-width: 100%;

div.span: Also, if you are having tech issues with your student's Chromebook, here is the Jeffco website that has some troubleshooting advice. If that doesn't help, I can submit a work ticket with the following information: the student's name, your phone # and/or email along with a summary of the issue. The service desk will then contact you. Ann.Rames@jeffco.k12.co.us

div.div: Title IX requires school districts to designate at least one employee as their Title IX Coordinator. Jeffco Public Schools has designated District Title IX Coordinator, Kristin Moulton.
